item.title: Sauna / What Dean Promised I am Doing
item.description: As part of pre-election promises for both terms the current dean of Faculty of Fine Arts promised a school sauna for students and employees of faculty. However this populist promise was never realized. To react I took his promise seriously and tried my bestâ€¦ Sauna was operating from January 2017 to March 2017, freely open to all students, employees and visitors of faculty.
